Requirements
============

* JDK
* JCC (from PyLucene)
* PyLucene

JCC and PyLucene must be compiled and installed wit shared library support. Please
read the installation instructions of JCC and PyLucene for more details.

Installation
============

$ make install

The Makefile takes the same arguments as PyLucene's Makefile

Testing
=======

$ make test

runs the doc tests.
